ai-atk-s0404a4:7_1: This world is observed. This world has been undertaken by you, it leads to the whole world. Your rags were over and done.
ai-atk-s0404a4:7_2: When he had spoken, he replied: “The sixteen verses consisting in the texts,” and they replied: “The eighty or sixteen respects, sixteen verses, eighteen in nine respects, ten or a single one,”
